definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: Wright envisaged the Guggenheim as “a curving wave that never breaks.”
sentences.chinese: 莱特把古根海姆看作是“永不断裂的连绵曲线”。

sentences.english: And I felt that when I went to the Guggenheim too.
sentences.chinese: 我去古根海姆博物馆也是这种感觉。

sentences.english: The Guggenheim and the Pompidou , believe you me, will be run smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 古根海姆蓬皮杜，相信我说的是真的，将一帆风顺。

definition: Carnegie (name)/Andrew Carnegie (1835-1919), Scots American steel millionaire and philanthropist
Paulson or Powellson (name)/Henry (Hank) Paulson (1946-), US banker, US Treasury Secretary from 2006
Pei Ieoh Ming or I.M. Pei (1917-2019), Chinese-American architect
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
George Soros or György Schwartz (1930-), Hungarian American financial speculator and millionaire philanthropist

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
